lead_paragraph: The comment was reminiscent of the primary campaign, rather than the more disciplined approach Mr. Trump has sought to take in recent weeks.

headline.print_headline: Trump Speaks on Trade, and Mostly on Topic
headline.main: Donald Trump, in a Trade Speech in New Hampshire, Veers Off to Jab Mexico

snippet: The comment was reminiscent of the primary campaign, rather than the more disciplined approach Mr. Trump has sought to take in recent weeks....
abstract: Political Memo; Donald J Trump focuses mainly on trade and stays for most part on topic during speech in Manchester, NH, in departure from unscripted style he has adhered to during campaign.
